DataElement.preferredName: PHQ-2 Less Than 3 Score Yes No NA Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether the score is less than three (3) on the Patient Health Questionnaire-2 (PHQ-2).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Health Questionnaire-2 Less Than Three Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 2-item scale used to screen for depression and anhedonia over the past 2 weeks. It is comprised of the first 2 items of the Patient Health Questionnaire-9.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 2-item scale used to screen for depression and anhedonia over the past 2 weeks. It is comprised of the first 2 items of the Patient Health Questionnaire-9.

Concepts.definition: A 2-item scale used to screen for depression and anhedonia over the past 2 weeks. It is comprised of the first 2 items of the Patient Health Questionnaire-9.

Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.
